name: Super Space Wars: The Cookie Chronicles
name_original: Super Space Wars: The Cookie Chronicles
description:
Play as Pudge, a sentient blob of cookie dough, as they navigate a dangerous space station under siege to find safety in the only refrigerator!

Watch out for fire, for if your temperature gets too high you will be baked into a cookie and it's game over!

Made for the Game Developers Club Northridge Game Jam.
